abstract: Off the Rails: A taxi medallion found on the street becomes a conversation starter, and a celebratory farewell for the M.T.A. chairman.
snippet: Off the Rails: A taxi medallion found on the street becomes a conversation starter, and a celebratory farewell for the M.T.A. chairman.
lead_paragraph: A few hours after our article about the million-dollar taxi medallion sale hit newsstands on Friday, we received a call from Tom Poteat, a cheerful fellow who had found himself in an odd predicament.

headline.main: A Million Bucks Lying on the Ground! Not Exactly
